title: Africa: the land and its people. No. 3
brief_description: Magazine items: Historical survey of the Union of South Africa as reflected in the Union’s architecture, furniture and sculpture - work of seventeenth-century French artist, Louis Michel Thibault. Growing of sisal on plantations in Kenya, Tanganyika and Nyasaland and the manufacture of sisal into string, twine and rope.
